metadata.title: CVE-2022-34481 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the nsTArray_Impl::ReplaceElementsAt() function, an integeroverflow could have occurred when the number of elements to replace was toolarge for the container. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 102, FirefoxESR < 91.11, Thunderbird < 102, and Thunderbird < 91.11.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
